text: Rossana Podestà (20 June 1934 – 10 December 2013) was an Italian actress. She was known for her roles in Ulysses and Helen of Troy. She was born in Tripoli, in the Italian colony of Libya on 20 June 1934. She was married to Walter Bonatti until his death in 2011. Podestà died from brain cancer in Rome, Italy, aged 79.Morta Rossana Podestà ==Some movies== * 1950: Strano appuntamento * 1951: Domani è un altro giorno * 1951: The Seven Dwarfs to the Rescue * 1952: Il moschettiere fantasma * 1955: Ulysses * 1958: Helen of Troy * 1964: Le ore nude * 1974: The Sensual Man * 1985: Segreti, segreti ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1934 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Deaths from brain cancer Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian stage actors Category:People from Tripoli
title: Rossana Podestà
